text: Alexa Demie (born circa 1990) is an American actress and singer. She is best known for her role as Maddy Perez in the HBO drama series Euphoria. ==Early life== Demie was born and raised in Los Angeles, California by her single mother Rose Mendez, a make-up artist. She is of Mexican descent on her mother's side. Demie initially claimed her birth year as 1994/1995, however she was accused of shaving several years off her age after it was revealed that she graduated from John Marshall High School in 2008. ==Career== Demie has guest starred on TV series such as Ray Donovan, Love, and The OA. In 2018, Demie appeared in Mid90s. In 2019, she began starring as Maddy Perez in the HBO drama series Euphoria. In August 2018, joined the cast of Waves alongside Sterling K. Brown and that of Mainstream, directed by Gia Coppola. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
